current.product_tab_payment_desc:
Dust or wipe clean with a cloth dampened with water once a week. Be sure not to leave water spots on the surface. These water spots will dry and could possibly leave permanent marks.

Clean stains/spots using the following steps: Dampen a soft cloth with a mixture of hot water and liquid dishwashing detergent. Wring the cloth as much as possible to remove excess liquid. Rub the surface lightly in a circular motion. Dry the surface immediately with a clean, soft towel.
current.product_tab_payment_content:
Payment Information

Dust or wipe clean with a cloth dampened with water once a week. Be sure not to leave water spots on the surface. These water spots will dry and could possibly leave permanent marks.

Clean stains/spots using the following steps: Dampen a soft cloth with a mixture of hot water and liquid dishwashing detergent. Wring the cloth as much as possible to remove excess liquid. Rub the surface lightly in a circular motion. Dry the surface immediately with a clean, soft towel.

settings.about_caption: At Organic Mandi, our mission is to help organic farmers get the best value for their products. All products on our platform are sold directly by verified farmers. Our aim is to ensure you get authentic natural produce directly from the people who grow it.

settings.title: India’s only organic farmer’s marketplace
settings.caption:
100% chemical free, verified produce
sold directly by farmers

settings.title: No Middlemen
settings.caption: Purchase directly from the verified organic farmers who grow your product

settings.title: Verified Organic Products
settings.caption: Comprehensive farmer verification process to ensure 100% organic products

settings.title: Continuous Testing
settings.caption: Randomly conducted pesticide residue tests to ensure 100% natural products.
I had an amazing experience buying from Organic Mandi! Great quality products and good service overall.
settings.name: Mayank Jain

settings.caption: Finally! I found a website where I can buy organic produce and be sure it is actually 100% organic!
settings.name: Sweta Jobanputra

settings.caption: Great work guys! Good to have a platform where we can directly buy from farmers and feel happy that they are getting more for their efforts. Keep it up!
settings.name: Ameya Panke

settings.caption: Really happy with the products from Organic Mandi! Will recommend it to my friends and family for sure!
settings.name: Aakash

settings.title: No Middlemen
settings.caption: Purchase directly from the verified organic farmers who grow your product

settings.title: Verified Organic Products
settings.caption: Comprehensive farmer verification process to ensure 100% organic products

settings.title: Continuous Testing
settings.caption: Randomly conducted pesticide residue tests to ensure 100% natural products.

Today, rampant use of synthetic fertilizers and pesticides have converted our food into poison. And an organic farmer is our biggest hope against the disastrous effects of industrial farming.

At Organic Mandi, our mission is to promote organic farming by ensuring that the organic farmers get the best value for his efforts. Our aim is to ensure you get authentic natural produce directly from the people who grow it.

settings.title: Free Shipping
settings.caption: With $100 or more orders. Go to Oars Store

settings.title: 100% Organic Certified
settings.caption: 100% Organic Cerfitifed Food & Textiles

settings.title: Secure Payment
settings.caption: Sercure Confirmed

settings.title: Identification
settings.caption: Our team works with with different NGOs and organizations to find potential farmers who are doing organic farming and have adopted it as a lifestyle change.

settings.title: Verification
settings.caption: Post identification we visit the farm of shortlisted farmers to verify their processes, certifications and production setup to ensure that we select only genuine organic farmers.

settings.title: Onboarding
settings.caption: We onboard farmers who meet our verification standards. If required, we also help them start their packaging unit and launch their brand.

settings.title: Random Testing
settings.caption: For all farmers registered with us, we continuously carry out random pesticide residue test to ensure that their is no deviation from our zero synthetic chemical policy.

settings.caption: An organic farmer since 1998, at age of 87 years, Shri Dinesh Balasavare's passion for natural farming continues to grow.
settings.name: Co-op. of Organic Farmers of India

settings.caption: This women only farmers' group driving organic farming in their taluka, is a true example of women empowerment.
settings.name: Krushikanya Sendriya Shetkari Gat

settings.caption: These farmers have combined organic farming with a mediation center and other farmers are learning from them.
settings.name: Bhagyarekha

settings.caption: These farmers from Parbhani are using Subash Palekar Natural Farming techniques, to grow high quality organic produce.
settings.name: Harit Kranti Sendriya Sheti Gat

settings.caption: Winners of numerous awards, farmers of this group have brought an organic revolution in Baramati in last 10 years.
settings.name: Pure Organic

settings.caption: After travelling across India to learn bee keeping, these farmers are teaching organic bee keeping to other farmers.
settings.name: Hemantgiri Krushi Gat
